channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Over two-thirds of retailers have already partially deployed AI agents for efficiency
item.description: Retailers are using agentic AI for customer service, but it holds the key to unlocking impactful data insights.

item.title: TCL’s new Samsung The Frame rival looks like a better TV, but is still missing the two most important features of The Frame
item.description: TCL's new A400 Pro is a Samsung The Frame Pro rival with a better mini-LED panel, but some significant differences may hold it back

item.title: In 2025, There Was One Good Meme After Another
item.description: The best memes of 2025? Time doesn't exist, yet it controls us anyway.

item.title: Des millions de smartphones ont été transformés en « usines à publicités »
item.description: Un malware s'est caché dans le code d'au moins 15 applis Android du Play Store. Intitulé GhostAd, le virus a transformé des millions de smartphones en « usines à publicités ». Ces pubs incessantes plombent les performances et la batterie des téléphones infectés.

item.title: Australia expects platforms to "stop under-16s from using VPNs" to evade social media ban
item.description: The regulator has refused to say how this will work in practice

item.title: SmartTube sur Android : désinstallez l’application immédiatement, elle est piratée
item.description: Vous avez vu passer une alerte Google Play Protect sur votre téléviseur ce week-end ? Ne l'ignorez surtout pas. SmartTube, le client alternatif YouTube adoré par beaucoup de monde, est victime d'une attaque. Des versions vérolées circulent, et vos données personnelles pourraient bien transiter vers des serveurs inconnus.

item.title: Our favorite portable SSD is on sale at Best Buy today – but you'll have to be quick
item.description: The Samsung S9 is a fantastic portable SSD and right now it's got a serious discount at Best Buy.

item.title: Asus Rog Xbox Ally : cette console-PC qui a dans le viseur le Steam Deck OLED perd 50 € de son prix
item.description: Si vous attendiez une baisse de prix sur la dernière console d'Asus, la ROG Xbox Ally, ça tombe bien : la voilà en promotion à 549 euros contre 599 euros de base. Une console portable qui renferme un vrai PC pour jouer à toutes vos ludothèques virtuelles Steam, Xbox, Epic Games Store.

item.title: The era of ads in ChatGPT begins – users furious as even $200 a month Pro subscribers hit with app suggestions
item.description: OpenAI has started testing app suggestions inside ChatGPT conversations, and even $200 a month Pro users are seeing them.

item.title: YouTube Recap 2025: How to access Google’s AI-powered answer to Spotify Wrapped and see your year in review
item.description: The question of your YouTube personality type has finally been answered. Many major platforms provide personalized “year in review” features that highlight how users have spent their time over the past year.

item.title: Ce neurochirurgien est formel : les aides à la conduites sur les voitures sauvent plus de vies que les médecins
item.description: Les conducteurs font assez peu confiance dans les aides à la conduite. Et pourtant, bien configurées, elles peuvent sauver des vies, comme le prouve ce neurochirurgien, avec les données de Google.

item.title: Tier List XXL des meilleures et pires voitures électriques de 2025 : l’émission Survoltés fait son grand show aujourd’hui
item.description: Comme l’an passé, l’équipe Survoltés - accompagnée de la team Vroom de Numerama - va faire son show lors d’une émission Twitch spéciale fin d’année. Au menu du jour : une Tier List XXL qui nous permettra de classer une trentaine de voitures électriques sorties en 2025.

item.title: Mars cachait peut-être un climat tropical : la découverte d’un minéral clé intrigue les scientifiques
item.description: Sur Mars, des roches blanches mystérieuses découvertes par le rover Perseverance pourraient bien révéler un secret ancien : la Planète rouge aurait un jour connu des pluies torrentielles et un climat tropical ! Si leur origine reste un mystère, ces roches ouvrent une fenêtre sur un passé humide...

item.title: Une app gouvernementale impossible à supprimer, nouveau casse-tête pour Apple
item.description: Depuis les débuts de l'iPhone, Apple a toujours refusé de préinstaller d'autres applications sur ses smartphones que les siennes. Mais la pression de certains gouvernements pourrait faire craquer cette citadelle.

item.title: Want a Fortell Hearing Aid? Well, Who Do You Know?
item.description: AI-powered startup Fortell has become a secret handshake for the privileged hearing-impaired crowd who swear by the product. Now, it wants to be in your ears.

item.title: We played Metroid Prime 4, ask us anything
item.description: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is one of those games that been a long time coming. Fans have been waiting almost a decade for the next entry in Samus' first-person adventures. Early previews painted an alarming picture of overly chatty sidekicks ruining what's traditionally a lonely and moody experience. Meanwhile formal reviews run a gamut of […]

item.title: Spotify Wrapped 2025 turns listening into a competition
item.description: It’s time for year-end lists, annual roundups, and, of course, Spotify Wrapped. The usual suspects are here, like your most listened to song, your total time listened, and your favorite artist. You also get your 2025 Wrapped playlist, which now shows how many times you listened to each of your top 100 tracks this year. […]

item.title: Spotify Wrapped 2025 adds its first multiplayer feature with ‘Wrapped Party’
item.description: Spotify Wrapped returns to its data-driven roots with new interactive features, deeper insights, and social experiences designed to revive its fan-favorite feel.

item.title: Spotify Wrapped 2025 has landed – here's how to find it, plus the best new features this year
item.description: Spotify has launched its annual look back at user listening habits over the last 12 months, and there's lots that's new.

item.title: Spotify Wrapped 2025 not working? Try these 3 fixes to help it show up
item.description: Having trouble finding your Spotify Wrapped 2025 recap? Try these potential fixes.

item.title: Boîte de réception | Ménage numérique, réglages d’usine et la police du Net
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, on s’interroge sur l’utilité de nettoyer son PC, on retrouve les réglages d’usine d’un vieil appareil et on tente de joindre la police du Net.

item.title: Cette marque trop peu connue veut chambouler la photo sur smartphone : voici comment
item.description: Le géant chinois méconnu en Europe sort les muscles et présente deux ambitieuses innovations pour améliorer les téléobjectifs de nos smartphones.

item.title: Don’t want a Garmin Fenix 8 Pro? You can get one of its best features separately with the inReach Mini 3 Plus
item.description: Garmin has launched the inReach Mini 3 Plus satellite communicator with some handy new features.

item.title: You can try the worst game of 2025 for free right now – go on, you know you want to
item.description: You can play a bit of MindsEye for free thanks to a new starter pack version.

item.title: Nothing looks to its community to raise $5M, wants to be ‘IPO-ready’ in 3 years
item.description: The new round, which opens on December 10, will enable consumers to buy the company's shares at its Series C valuation of $1.3 billion.

item.title: Testing ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude in the multimodal maze
item.description: An AI eye test for ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude

item.title: AMD will reportedly jack up its GPU prices, so if you see a good sale this holiday season, don’t hesitate
item.description: In a period of uncertainty in the PC market due to the AI boom, GPUs could be next in line to see price hikes, possibly starting with AMD's Radeon cards.

item.title: Helldivers perd 85% de son poids sur PC grâce à une astuce toute simple
item.description: Helldivers 2 pèse lourd, trop lourd dans sa version PC. Arrowhead, le studio derrière le jeu multijoueur, vient d'annoncer une nouvelle attendue depuis des mois : Helldivers 2 subit une immense cure d'amincissement pour votre SSD.

item.title: Love lattes? I test coffee makers for a living and these are my top 3 recommendations for the creamiest drinks
item.description: Tired of paying a premium for take-out lattes? These three coffee makers will handle all the prep for you.

item.title: Jetez cet outil Microsoft par la porte, il revient par la fenêtre !
item.description: Microsoft annonce la généralisation des réunions metaverses dans Teams et supprime sa plateforme auparavant dédiés au expérience immersives 3D, Microsoft Mesh.

item.title: À seulement 379 €, ce laptop Asus avec 16 Go de RAM et 1 To SSD va ravir les petits budgets
item.description: L'Asus VivoBook 15 X1504 est un PC portable avec un Core i3 parfait pour les étudiants et la bureautique à retrouver pour 379,99 euros au lieu de 499,99 euros sur Cdiscount.

item.title: Trump’s New Plan to Cut Energy Costs: Use Walmart’s Backup Generators
item.description: Well, it's *an* idea.

item.title: Fini d’allumer l’écran pour le déverrouiller : l’option géniale qui arrive enfin sur votre Pixel
item.description: Google ramène avec la version QPR2 d'Android 16 une fonction permettant de déverrouiller plus rapidement son Google Pixel.

item.title: The PSVR 2 is a massive upgrade on its predecessor, and it’s still on sale at a lowest-ever price right now
item.description: The PSVR 2 is still discounted following Cyber Monday. You can get the latest VR headset alongside Horizon Call of the Mountain for a lowest ever price.

item.title: Get the perfect PS Portal setup with these discounted accessories
item.description: These discounted PS Portal accessories offer the perfect chance to upgrade your remote play setup.

item.title: C’est parti : AMD augmente en douce le prix de ses processeurs Ryzen 9000… mais pas que
item.description: AMD a commencé à donner le mot d'ordre pour une hausse du prix de ses processeurs Ryzen 9000 auprès des distributeurs. Cette décision concerne aussi certaines références d'ancienne génération, et s'inscrit dans un contexte particulièrement morose pour le marché PC en cette fin d'année 2025.

item.title: Cyber Monday is over but Nacon's best PS5 and Xbox controllers are still on sale, and I can't recommend these deals highly enough
item.description: Nacon's premium Revolution controllers for PS5 and Xbox are still enjoying some of their lowest ever prices.

item.title: Squarespace’s Cyber Week continues - grab 20% off before it’s gone
item.description: This is one of the best deals I’ve seen from Squarespace this year, don’t miss it

item.title: After intense backlash, India pulls mandate to pre-install government app on smartphones
item.description: On Wednesday, the Indian telecom ministry said Sanchar Saathi, an anti-theft and cybersecurity protection app, would remain voluntary, and that smartphone makers would no longer be required to preload it on devices they sell.

item.title: It's not too late to grab a bargain! This Dell laptop deal with AMD Ryzen 7 250 and 16GB of high-speed RAM is the fastest notebook you can buy for under $450
item.description: Dell 16 Laptop is now just $450, a staggering $250 off the usual price of $700, but it won't be around for long.

item.title: Lego has dropped the Icons Stranger Things: The Creel House to celebrate the shows final season
item.description: Lego has revealed the Lego Icons Stranger Things: The Creel House set, which is set to be released on Jan. 1, 2026 with a price tag of $299.99 after the series finale.

item.title: I tested the Zettlab D6 NAS and with local AI, it's like having a personal assistant to log, document and find my files
item.description: The Zettlab D6 is a six-bay NAS with built-in AI, enabling media indexing and local language model download and use. Semantic search allows deep content analysis, while a unique chat interface gives a more intuitive, human-like way to manage your storage.

item.title: 4 Best Smart Displays (2025): Tested By a Smart Home Addict
item.description: Looking for a smart speaker that can do more than just talk back to you? These smart displays can stream your favorite shows, join a video call, and even double as a digital photo frame.

item.title: AI safety report: Only 3 models make the grade
item.description: The latest AI safety index report reveals an industry that still can't regulate itself.

item.title: How to watch Jake Paul vs Anthony Joshua live on Netflix — dates, fight-card and preview
item.description: Here's how to watch Jake Paul vs Anthony Joshua live on Netflix as the two faceoff in a heavyweight bout on December 19 at the Kaseya Center, Miami, Florida.

item.title: ‘Stranger Things’ Star Cara Buono Talks About Her Wine Mom Breakout Moment
item.description: Cara Buono has played Karen Wheeler across all five seasons of the Netflix hit, and the stakes for her character have never been higher.

item.title: Mirumi the furry companion robot is now available on Kickstarter
item.description: Among a sea of new TVs, robovacs, and smart glasses, Yukai Engineering’s Mirumi was a unique standout at CES 2025 earlier this year. The tiny robot has no practical purpose other than looking adorable and bringing a smile to people’s faces by simulating an inquisitive personality. The company planned to release the companion bot sometime […]

item.title: Uber and Avride launch robotaxi service in Dallas
item.description: The robotaxis will initially have a human safety operator behind the wheel who will monitor the ride.

item.title: La nouvelle barre de son immersive de Harman Kardon, notée 9/10 par nos soins, s’offre déjà 33% de remise chez Boulanger
item.description: Faites entrer le cinéma chez vous avec la Harman Kardon Enchant 1100 qui s'offre une baisse de 33% chez Boulanger et voit son prix passer de 899 euros à 599 euros.

item.title: Dont miss the Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 still at its best-ever price after Cyber Monday — save over $100
item.description: As of Dec. 3, the Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 (44mm) is still on sale at its lowest-ever price of $159.99 after Cyber Monday at Amazon. This is 43% off its list price of $279.99.

item.title: Wait, what? Black Friday is over, but this MSI Claw deal is probably the best value on a handheld gaming PC you'll see all year
item.description: Pick up the MSI Claw A1M for less than half price – this is one Cyber Week deal you won't want to miss.

item.title: The Eufy E25 robot vacuum and mop is still at its lowest-ever price after Cyber Monday
item.description: As of Dec. 3, the Eufy E25 robot vacuum and mop is on sale at its lowest-ever price of $599.99 at Amazon. This is 45% off its list price of $1,099.99.
